pages.text: Little Logistics adds charming and functional transport options to Minecraft. $(br2)Create networks of boats, barges, trains, and more to transport items and fluids across your world.
To start, craft a Boat or Train Dock, then connect it to a network with rails or water routes. $(br2)Create barges to carry items or fluids, and set up Train Docks to transport goods overland.

With the Little Contraptions add-on, integrate your logistics network seamlessly with Create machines. $(br2)Use Create belts, gears, and windmills to load and unload items from your boats and trains for a fully automated logistics system.
